name: Frontlines
description: Each cell gains more troops by having less neighbors than it possibly can. For example, if a cell could have a maximum of 4 neighbors, having 3 neighbors would increase the troopcount in that cell by 1 at the start of a turn, whereas having 1 neighbor would increase it by 3. Difficulty ranges from 0-3, choosing which turn you go on, and can be set by changing the number in the difficulty.txt file.
